title: FS: Sweet Cap & Piedmont empty cigarette packs (reduced 11/16)
author: jp1216

posts.post_title: FS: Sweet Cap & Piedmont empty cigarette packs (reduced 11/16)
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell these as a pair.  Both have 1901 tax stamps and the SC has a 1903 ink stamp.  This dates them from 1901-1908.  Both are 10 stick packs - same size and design as T206 card packs.  Condition as shown.  Both have the inside slides.  Great for displays or companions to the T206 set.

Price is $145/delivered.  PayPal F&F please.  PM if interested.

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/SCpack.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/S01.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/S02.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/P01.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://www.billripken.com/bucket/P02.jpg[/IMG]

Hi Jon

Email sent.

TED Z
